name: Jurassic World Evolution 2 Sandbox Mode Save File

description: Jurassic World Evolution 2 automatically saves SANDBOX files and stores them in your local application data directory under the Jurassic World Evolution 2 save path. Each SANDBOX file corresponds to a specific park and island, and the game often uses a shared autosave slot for Sandbox mode.
You can typically find SANDBOX files in the following directory:
C:\​Users\​[YourUserName]\​Saved Games\​Frontier Developments\​Jurassic World Evolution 2\​[17-digit ID]\​Saves\​
